questions.question: What is the main benefit of using a Knowledge article in an Agentforce Data Library?
options: Only the retriever for Knowledge articles allows agents to access Knowledge from both inside the platform and on a customerâ€™s website.
The retriever for Knowledge articles has better accuracy and performance than the default retriever.
It provides a structured, searchable repository of approved documents so the agent can retrieve reliable information for each inquiry.
questions.explanation: Knowledge articles provide a trusted, structured source of approved content that agents can reliably retrieve to answer customer questions.

questions.question: What is the primary function of the reasoning engine in Agentforce?
options: Identifying agent topics and actions to respond to user utterances.
Generating record queries based on conversation history.
Offering real-time natural language responses during conversations.
questions.explanation: The reasoning engine identifies the appropriate topics and actions needed to respond to user utterances.

questions.question: When a customer chat is initiated, which functionality in Salesforce provides generative AI replies or draft emails based on recommended Knowledge articles?
options: Einstein Grounding
Einstein Reply Recommendations
Einstein Service Replies
questions.explanation: Einstein Service Replies generates AI-powered replies or draft emails grounded in recommended Knowledge articles.

questions.question:
Leadership needs to populate a dynamic form field with a summary or description created by a large language model (LLM) to facilitate more productive conversations with customers. Leadership also wants to keep a human in the loop as part of their AI strategy.

Which prompt template type should the Agentforce Specialist recommend?
options: Field Generation
Record Summary
Sales Email
questions.explanation: Field Generation allows AI-generated content to populate a field while keeping a human in the loop for review.

questions.question:
Universal Containers built a Field Generation prompt template that worked for many records, but users are reporting random failures with token limit errors.

What is the cause of the random nature of this error?
options: The template type needs to be switched to Flex to accommodate variable token usage.
The number of tokens generated by the dynamic nature of the prompt template varies by record.
The number of tokens that can be processed by the LLM varies with total user demand.
questions.explanation: Dynamic grounding data can vary in size by record, causing token usage to fluctuate and occasionally exceed limits.

questions.question: In the context of retriever and search indexes, what best describes the data preparation process in Data Cloud?
options: Aggregating, normalizing, and encoding structured datasets for governance compliance.
Loading, chunking, vectorizing, and storing content in a search-optimized manner to support retrieval from the vector database.
Real-time ingestion and dynamic indexing without preprocessing.
questions.explanation: Data Cloud prepares data by chunking, vectorizing, and indexing it for efficient semantic retrieval.

questions.question:
An Agentforce Specialist at Universal Containers is setting up a new Field Generation prompt template but the AI spark icon does not appear on the target field after activation.

Which critical step did the Agentforce Specialist miss?
options: They forgot to edit the Lightning page layout and associate the field to a prompt template.
They forgot to reactivate the Lightning page layout for the object after activating the prompt template.
They forgot to enable the field for reporting.
questions.explanation: After activating a Field Generation prompt template, the Lightning page layout must be reactivated for the spark icon to appear.

questions.question:
A Universal Containers administrator is setting up Einstein Data Libraries. After creating a new library, the administrator notices that only the file upload option is available and there is no option to configure the library using a Salesforce Knowledge base.

What is the most likely cause of this issue?
options: Salesforce Knowledge is not enabled in the organization.
The org lacks Einstein for Service permissions.
The administrator is not using Lightning Experience.
questions.explanation: The Knowledge-based data source option is available only when Salesforce Knowledge is enabled in the org.

questions.question:
Universal Containers would like to route a Service Agent conversation to a human agent queue.

Which tool connects the Service Agent to the human agent queue for escalation?
options: Prompt Flow
Outbound Omni-Channel Flow
Screen Flow
questions.explanation: Outbound Omni-Channel Flow is used to route conversations from agents to human queues.

questions.question:
An administrator wants to check the response of a Flex prompt template but the preview button is greyed out.

What is the reason for this?
options: The prompt has not been saved and activated.
A merge field has not been inserted in the prompt.
The records related to the prompt have not been selected.
questions.explanation: Flex prompt templates require record selection before the preview option becomes available.
